data.event_time_duration: Jan 30 at 6:00 AM to Jan 31 8:00 PM
data.event_html:
AFTER A SUCCESSFULL COMPLETION OF MANY RIDES IN  2015  WE ARE AGAIN EXPLORING ONE NEW PLACE AND THIS TIME WE ARE RIDING ONLY 250KM FROM ONE SIDE. 

THIS TIME ITS NOT A RIDE WE ADDED SOME ADVENTURE ACTIVITIES INTO OUR RIDE.  

DESTINATION IS FIXED – MORNI HILLS   BECAUSE ITS ONE DAY STAY. 

WE WILL LEAVE FOR OUR DESTINATION BY 6.00 am. WE WILL REACH TO OUR DESTINATION  BY LUNCH. AS OUR CAMPING SITE IS NEAR TO TIKKAR TAAL WE CAN TREK  TO TAAL AND COME BACK TO OUR CAMPS BY EVENING. FOLLOWED WITH   BONFIRE AND SNACKS(VEG & NON VEG) WITH MUSIC.

ADVENTURE ACTIVITIES WILL ADD SOME CHARM TO THE RIDE THAT WE WILL BE DOING NEXT MORNING. 

Activities

  1. Obstacle course – Archery – Trampoline -Camel Ride
  2. Boating –Trekking –Hiking 
  3. Bonfire with Light music
  4. Out Door Games
  5. Volley Ball-Foot Ball- Cricket – Bat mention- Disc  

BLOCK YOUR DATES : 30th January – 31st January 2016

OUR ROUTE – NEW DELHI- KARNAL – AMBALA- ZIRAKPUR – MORNI HILLS 

Total Kilometeres – 500KM (Approx/updown)

Total Amount – 2500/- ( Per Person) excluding petrol

Couple – 4500/- ( Per Person ) excluding petrol

Registration Amount – 1000/- (Non Refundable)

Price inclusive of :-

  • 2 breakfast, 2 Lunch & 1 dinner (veg& non veg)
  • Twin sharing Camps.
  • First- aid kit with necessary medicines.
  • Unforgettable memory for the all life!!

EXCLUSIONS:

  • Extra Transportation not included in trip.
  • Please carry luggage in small bag which can be adjusted on bike easily, do not carry extra luggage.
  • Expenses of personal nature such as table drinks, snacks, telephone calls, laundry, camera fee for still or video camera, tips to drivers and local guides.
  • Roads conditions are not good so we advised you to service your machines before ride and take extra clutch wires , acceleration wires and brake wires with you .

ACCOUNT DETAILS :-

BANK- AXIS BANK LTD.

ACCOUNT NAME :- DELHI BIKERS ADVENTURE TOUR GROUP

ACCOUNT NUMBER :- 914020010095494

BRANCH - PALWAL, HARYANA

IFS CODE :- UTIB0000429

For confirmation you can deposit (1000/- )amount and after depositing the amount just send the Refrence Number if you are transfering amount, scanned copy or a picture of the pay in slip at 

delhibikersadventuregroup@gmail.com or whats app us - 09255880005
